intro:
Introducing Spot The Difference Sports, brought to you by the original creators of the globally renowned Spot The Difference amusement machine game. Now, with an exciting new twist: a thrilling two-player mode that lets you compete head-to-head against anyone, anytime.

Embark on an action-packed journey through the world of sports in Spot The Difference. Retaining the same captivating gameplay as the beloved original, this edition challenges your sharp eyes and quick thinking to spot all the differences before your opponent does. Whether you're facing off against a friend or racing against the clock in single-player mode, get ready for an immersive experience that puts your observation skills to the test.
